sentences.sContent: We looked carefully at every car that drove past.
sentences.sCn: 我们仔细地看着驶过的每一辆汽车。

sentences.sContent: Every child will receive a certificate at the end of the course.
sentences.sCn: 课程结束时，每一个孩子都可以获得证书。

sentences.sContent: I enjoyed every minute of the film.
sentences.sCn: 那部电影我从头到尾都看得很过瘾。

sentences.sContent: I listened carefully to every word he said.
sentences.sCn: 他说的每一个字我都听得很仔细。

phrases.pCn: 所有其他的；每隔一个的

trans.tranOther: used to refer to all the people or things in a particular group or all the parts of something
